channel.title: How to make a spell speak
channel.description: how would i make it so that when u cast the spell it speaks?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 03, 2007, 07:57:53 AM[/size][hr]any1 help?

item.title: How to make a spell speak
item.dc:creator: @0wnz0r 0wnz0r
item.description:
@0wnz0r wrote:

Ok look at my wind strike:

if (spellID == 1152) { // Wind Strike if(playerLevel[6] >= 0) { txt4 = "Look I am saying this when I cast wind strike!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; ProjectileSpellPlayer(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 1); hitDiff = misc.random(4); } else { sendMessage("You need a magic lvl of 0 for this spell !"); } }

I hope this helps you.
Just add the txt4 thing.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a spell speak
